cvut.fel.mobilevoting.murinrad.communications
Interface ConnectionInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Connection
public interface ConnectionInterface

An interface that connection managers must obey to be used in this application

Author:
Radovan Murin

postAndRecieve

void postAndRecieve(java.lang.String method,
                    java.lang.String URL,
                    java.util.ArrayList<BasicHeader> headers,
                    java.lang.String body,
                    boolean authenticate)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Posts a request

Parameters:
method - the method of the request
URL - the URL
headers - headers to be included, can be NULL
body - the request body, can be NULL
authenticate - if true, the username and password will be sent in the message headers
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Parses the responce code

Parameters:
data - the responce data recieved in the responce header
Returns:
returns true if 200, false if anything else - server error

Returns the parent view of the connection Interface

Returns:
true if 200, else false
